verses.verse: Oh <S%H8628>clap<s%> your <S%H3709>hands,<s%> all you <S%H5971>nations.<s%> <S%H7321>Shout<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>triumph!<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> Most <S%H5945>High<s%> is <S%H3372>awesome.<s%> He is a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> over all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He <S%H1696>subdues<s%> <S%H5971>nations<s%> under <S%H5971>us,<s%> and peoples under our <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
He <S%H977>chooses<s%> our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for <S%H1347>us,<s%> the glory of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> whom he <S%H157>loved.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> has gone <S%H5927>up<s%> with a <S%H8643>shout,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H7782>trumpet.<s%>
Sing <S%H2167>praise<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> sing <S%H2167>praises.<s%> Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to our <S%H4428>King,<s%> sing <S%H2167>praises.<s%>
For <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H4428>King<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth.<s%> Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> with <S%H7919>understanding.<s%>

The <S%H5081>princes<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are gathered <S%H622>together,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham.<s%> For the <S%H4043>shields<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> belong to <S%H430>God.<s%> He is <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H5927>exalted!<s%>
